message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,500.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $10,500 is still above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $8,500 is your maximum budget, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9,750. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  However, $9,750 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9,000.  This is a fair compromise that allows us both to make a deal.

I understand that you're trying to be reasonable, Bob, but I still need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to come down further and offer the product to you for $9,250. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,250 is still above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000. This is a fair price for both of us and will allow us to close the deal. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to stick to your budget, but I've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $9,100. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
